caption:
“We conquer ourselves to follow Christ.”

Reflection:
The fiercest battle is within. Victory comes when pride bows and love commands.

Commentary:
This reflection speaks of inner warfare — self-discipline and humility as paths to true discipleship. The hardest enemy to defeat is the self.
